abstract: Jive Software, the leading maker of Facebook-type software for businesses, is releasing free and "use anywhere" versions which it hopes will encourage customers to use the cloud-based versions of its product, along with some powerful analytics. Like its competitors Yammer and Salesforce, Jive hopes it can make social communications the core of business.

headline.print_headline: In-House Kind Of ‘Facebooks’ Gain in Popularity
